objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none'><defs><radialGradient id='backgroundGradient' cx='540' cy='540' r='700' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#303F9F'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#1A237E'/></radialGradient><radialGradient id='accentGradient' cx='850' cy='450' r='120' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFD54F'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFC107'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='bottomGradient' x1='0' y1='800' x2='1080' y2='800' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FF80AB' stop-opacity='0.2'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#FFC107' stop-opacity='0.2'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#backgroundGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='280' fill='white' stroke-dasharray='15,15' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' stroke-dasharray='15,15' stroke='#EEEEEE' stroke-width='3'/><circle cx='850' cy='450' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' stroke='#FFD54F' stroke-width='3'/><rect x='0' y='800' width='1080' height='280' fill='url(#bottomGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='200' cy='900' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='10' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><circle cx='100' cy='540' r='50' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='980' cy='540' r='50' fill='none' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></g><line x1='200' y1='150' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='#FF80AB' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='880' y1='150' x2='780' y2='100' stroke='#FF80AB' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='200' y1='800' x2='150' y2='850' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='880' y1='800' x2='930' y2='850' stroke='#FFC107' stroke-width='3'/></svg>

product_details.description: The Adizero Adios Pro 3 is the pinnacle of Adizero Racing products. It was built with and for athletes to achieve unbelievable feats. These adidas running shoes are made to optimize running efficiency. Our carbon-infused ENERGYRODS 2.0 provide lightweight stiffness for a snappy, efficient stride. Ultralight LIGHTSTRIKE PRO cushions every step with two layers of our most resilient foam to help you maintain energy over the long term. It all rides on a thin layer of textile rubber outsole for extraordinary traction in wet and dry conditions. Celebrating our most recent win, Best Speed Shoe 2024 by Women's Health. ENERGYRODS 2.0 limit energy loss Imported Lightstrike Pro cushioning Sole material - Rubber ** Closure type - Lace-Up **

banner_details:
This vibrant and modern banner features a sports shoe promotional layout with a radial gradient background transitioning from deep blue to purple, accented with dashed circular lines for dynamic focal framing. At the center is a realistic product image of a black shoe placed within white concentric circles. The top section includes two bold text layers: the [heading] in large white uppercase font and the [subheading] in a warm yellow tone. A standout yellow circular badge displays the [price] near the product. At the bottom, a soft gradient overlay supports a centered [description] in white along with a yellow rectangular [cta_button_background] containing the black [cta] text. Additional graphic elements include decorative lines and subtle circles for visual rhythm.  
Color Palette:  
- Deep Royal Blue (#1A237E)  
- Indigo (#303F9F)  
- Bright Yellow (#FFD54F)  
- Mustard Yellow (#FFC107)  
- Soft Pink (#FF80AB)  
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)  
- Charcoal Black (#212121)
product_color: This product image features a sleek black athletic shoe with a modern design, ideal for a dynamic and energetic advertisement banner. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), which provides a strong and bold foundation. Accents of white (#E6E6E6) are used in the form of three signature stripes, offering crisp contrast and brand identity. A subtle blend of pink (#F3A6B5) and yellow (#F7CB4E) appears on the midsole, creating a gradient that adds vibrancy and movement without overwhelming the design. These colors are carefully integrated, with dark tones highlighting the shoe’s silhouette and the pastel tones adding an energetic focal point.
